attributes.action: extend child fares on buses, trains etc to cover 16 and 17 year olds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to petition for child fares to be extended to 16 and 17 years olds.

We are still classed as children in the law so why do we have to pay adult fares on buses, trains etc!?!

the reasons we are still children:
- We cannot vote
- We cannot get married without parental consent
- We still get put in YOUNG offenders institutes
- The majority of us are still in full time education
- Even if we do have a job, we still get paid less than 'adults'
- We can't buy or drink alcohol (LEGALLY)
- We can't go to clubs (again LEGALLY)
- We can't buy or see any films with an age rating of above 15
- We are always told to grow up, always told we are children etc etc
- Plus many more reasons

Lets actually get us child fares because legally, we are still children!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "extend child fares on buses, trains etc to cover 16 and 17 year olds."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18056


Prime Minister's Office
